title: 1981년 Maggio 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Franklin RABY v. Ross MAGGIO, Warden, Hunt Correctional Center
**판결일**: 1981-12-14
**법원**: Supreme Court of Louisiana
**관할**: Louisiana, LA

## 인용

- 407 So. 2d 744

## 판결문 요약


In re Franklin Raby, applying for supervisory writs and writs of certiorari, prohibition, and mandamus. Parish of East Baton Rouge. No. 5-79-354.
Granted. Out of time appeal ordered as to relator’s conviction of attempted armed robbery and aggravated battery.
